role_dependencies: Ensures Snap is installed on Linux systems
role_description: An Ansible role that installs OnionShare (an application that allows you to transfer files over Tor) on nearly any platform
role_description_full_overview: [OnionShare](https://.onionshare.org/) is an open source tool that lets you securely and anonymously share files, host websites, and chat with friends using the Tor network.
role_description_alt: This repository is the home of an Ansible role that installs OnionShare (an application that allows you to transfer files over Tor) on nearly any platform.
